title: Yoraiz0r\'s Spell
summaries: Rocket particles from feet similar to <linked>Rocket Boots</linked> without any actual wing graphics.
Horizontal hovering with ▼ Down+ ↷ Jump.
Emits faint red light and gives player glowing red eyes.
Glow depends on accessory slot: bottom slot offers brightest glow, top slot disables glow.
Eyes dyed from pet dye slot, rocket effect dyed from accessory slot.
source: Hardmode Treasure Bag(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) (except Queen Slime's)
